metadata.title: CVE-2024-36949 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:amd/amdkfd: sync all devices to wait all processes being evictedIf there are more than one device doing reset in parallel, the firstdevice will call kfd_suspend_all_processes() to evict all processeson all devices, this call takes time to finish. other device willstart reset and recover without waiting. if the process has not beenevicted before doing recover, it will be restored, then caused pagefault.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
